archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.2.8d: d) websites that may have been set up using domain names similar to those used by the organisation are monitored (e.g. by using external party monitoring services)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
